title: Enhancing Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Evidence-Based Medicine Practitioner Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate evidence-based medical research literature and apply it to practice
Learners can systematically structure clinical questions using the PICO framework
Learners can propose solutions to community health issues by applying systematic literature review methodologies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
